TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpListener extends System.Object

summary.span: 侦听来自 TCP 网络客户端的连接。

span.span: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了简单的方法，这些方法在阻止同步模式下侦听和接受传入连接请求。The class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode. 您可以使用 或 来连接 。You can use either a or a to connect with a . 使用 、本地 IP 地址和端口号，或只使用端口号创建 。Create a using an , a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number. 如果希望基础服务提供商为你分配这些值，请为本地 IP 地址指定 ，并指定0作为本地端口号。Specify for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you. 如果你选择执行此操作，则可以在套接字连接后使用 属性来确定所分配的信息。If you choose to do this, you can use the property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected. 使用 方法开始侦听传入连接请求。Use the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests. 将排队传入的连接，直到调用 方法或它已排队 为止。 will queue incoming connections until you either call the method or it has queued . 使用 或 从传入连接请求队列请求连接。Use either or to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue. 这两种方法将会阻止。These two methods will block. 如果要避免阻塞，可以使用 方法来确定连接请求在队列中是否可用。If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue. 调用 方法来关闭 。Call the method to close the . > [!NOTE] > 方法不会关闭任何已接受的连接。The method does not close any accepted connections. 你负责单独关闭这些。You are responsible for closing these separately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 。The following code example creates a . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)] 有关客户端示例，请参阅 。See for a client example.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数已过时。This constructor is obsolete. 使用 或 构造函数。Use the or constructors. 此构造函数允许你指定用于侦听传入连接尝试的端口号。This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 利用此构造函数，基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的网络地址。With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address. 如果你不介意使用哪一个本地端口，则可以指定0作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法，则可以通过使用 属性来发现分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口号。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用 方法，开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用本地端口号创建 。The following code example creates a using a local port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你指定要在其上侦听传入连接尝试的本地 IP 地址和端口号。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用此构造函数之前，必须使用所需的本地 IP 地址和端口号创建 。Before using this constructor, you must create an using the desired local IP address and port number. 将此 作为 `localEP` 参数传递到构造函数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter. 如果你不关心分配了哪个本地地址，则可以使用 作为 address 参数创建 ，基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 如果你有多个网络接口，这可能有助于简化你的应用程序。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不介意使用哪个本地端口，则可以使用0作为端口号来创建 。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法，则可以通过使用 属性来发现分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口号。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用 方法，开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用本地终结点创建 类的实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class using the local endpoint. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你指定要在其上侦听传入连接尝试的本地 IP 地址和端口号。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 在调用此构造函数之前，必须先使用所需的本地地址创建 。Before calling this constructor you must first create an using the desired local address. 将此 作为 `localaddr` 参数传递到构造函数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localaddr` parameter. 如果你不关心分配了哪个本地地址，请指定 `localaddr` 参数 ，基础服务提供程序将分配最适当的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, specify for the `localaddr` parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 如果你有多个网络接口，这可能有助于简化你的应用程序。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不介意使用哪一个本地端口，则可以指定0作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配介于1024和5000之间的可用端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用此方法，则可以通过使用 属性来发现分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口号。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用 方法，开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用本地 IP 地址和端口号创建 类的实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class using a local IP address and port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request.

returns.span: 用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: A used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种阻止方法，它返回可用于发送和接收数据的 。 is a blocking method that returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 如果要避免阻塞，请使用 方法来确定传入连接队列中是否有连接请求。If you want to avoid blocking, use the method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue. 返回的 将用远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号进行初始化。The returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 您可以使用 类中提供的任何 和 方法来与远程主机通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 使用完 后，请确保调用其 方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用 方法，而不是 方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 提供了在阻止同步模式下通过网络发送和接收数据的简单方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，使用 方法返回 。In the following code example, the method is used to return a . 此 用于与新连接的客户端进行通信。This is used to communicate with the newly connected client. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求以作为异步操作。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回了用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在接受套接字连接后，将完成返回的 对象。The returned object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted. 用远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号初始化 中返回的 。The returned in is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 您可以使用 类中提供的任何 和 方法来与远程主机通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 使用完 后，请确保调用其 方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用 方法，而不是 方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 提供了在阻止同步模式下通过网络发送和接收数据的简单方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing).

exception.span: 尚未通过调用 来启动该侦听器。

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否正主动侦听客户端连接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether is actively listening for client connections.

value.span: 如果 正主动侦听，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is actively listening; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 的类可以使用此属性来确定 当前是否正在侦听传入的连接尝试。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if the is currently listening for incoming connection attempts. 属性可用于避免冗余 尝试。The property can be used to avoid redundant attempts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AllowNatTraversal(bool allowed) cil managed

param.name: allowed
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指定是启用还是禁用 NAT 遍历。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.

summary.span: 启用或禁用针对 实例的网络地址转换 (NAT) 遍历。

span.span: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于为 实例启用或禁用 NAT 遍历。The method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a instance. 可以使用 Teredo、6to4 或 ISATAP 隧道来提供 NAT 遍历。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 如果 `allowed` 参数为 false，则关联套接字上的 选项设置为 。When the `allowed` parameter is false, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这会显式禁用 实例的 NAT 遍历。This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 如果 `allowed` 参数为 true，则关联套接字上的 选项设置为 。When the `allowed` parameter is true, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这可能会允许 NAT 遍历系统上的 具体取决于系统上已有的防火墙规则。This may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system. 必须先调用 方法，然后才能调用 方法开始侦听传入连接请求（在绑定套接字之前）。The method must be invoked prior to calling the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound). 如果在 方法后调用 方法，则将引发 。If method is called after the method, then an will be thrown. Teredo 地址是前缀为2001::/32 的 IPv6 地址。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 可以通过正常的 DNS 名称解析来返回 Teredo 地址，或将其枚举为分配给本地接口的 IPv6 地址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

exception.span: 在调用 方法之后调用 方法

span.span: The method was called after calling the method

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步 操作必须通过调用 方法完成。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常，方法由 `callback` 委托调用。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 在操作完成之前，此方法不会被阻止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要在操作完成之前一直阻止，请使用 方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[以异步方式调用同步方法](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously). > [!NOTE] > 可以调用返回的 的 属性来识别远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can call the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果收到 ，请使用 属性获取特定的错误代码，并参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档以获取错误的详细说明。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来创建和连接套接字。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to create and connect a socket. 回调委托调用 方法来结束异步请求。The callback delegate calls the method to end the asynchronous request. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指定 是否只允许一个基础套接字来侦听特定端口。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.

value.span: 如果 只允许一个 来侦听特定端口，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the allows only one to listen to a specific port; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 Windows Server 2003、Windows XP Service Pack 2 及更高版本中，默认为 ；在所有其他版本中，默认为 。

span.span: The default is for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and for all other versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，多个侦听器可以侦听特定端口。By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port. 但是，仅有一个侦听器可以对发送到端口的网络流量执行操作。However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port. 如果有多个侦听器尝试绑定到特定端口，则具有更具体的 IP 地址的侦听器会处理发送到该端口的网络流量。If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port. 您可以使用 属性来防止多个侦听器侦听特定端口。You can use the property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port. 在调用 之前设置此属性，或调用 方法，然后设置此属性。Set this property before calling , or call the method and then set this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置 属性。The following code example gets and sets the property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#2)]

summary.span: 确定是否有挂起的连接请求。

span.span: Determines if there are pending connection requests.

returns.span: 如果连接正挂起，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if connections are pending; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此非阻止方法确定是否有任何挂起的连接请求。This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests. 由于 和 方法在 方法排队传入连接请求之前会阻止执行，因此 方法可用于确定连接是否可用，然后再尝试接受它们。Because the and methods block execution until the method has queued an incoming connection request, the method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查 方法。The following code example checks the method. 如果连接请求正在等待接受，则对 方法进行调用。If a connection request is waiting to be accepted, then a call to the method is made. [!code-cpp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取基础网络 。

The underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个 来侦听传入的客户端连接请求。 creates a to listen for incoming client connection requests. 派生自 的类可以使用此属性来获取此 。Classes deriving from can use this property to get this . 如果需要访问 提供的权限之外的访问权限，请使用 属性返回的基础 。Use the underlying returned by the property if you require access beyond that which provides. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅返回用于侦听传入客户端连接请求的 。The property only returns the used to listen for incoming client connection requests. 使用 方法来接受挂起的连接请求，并获得用于发送和接收数据的 。Use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. 你还可以使用 方法来接受挂起的连接请求，并获得用于发送和接收数据的 。You can also use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 如果关闭连接，则将检索基础 ，并将 选项配置为10秒后超时。The underlying is retrieved and the option is configured to time out after 10 seconds if data still remains in the network buffer after the connection is closed. [!code-csharp[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 开始侦听传入的连接请求。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础 ，将其绑定到本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求，则 方法会将请求排队，并继续侦听其他请求，直到调用 方法。If a connection request is received, the method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果 在已将最大连接数排队后收到连接请求，则会在客户端上引发 。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入连接队列中删除连接，请使用 方法或 方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列中删除连接，并返回可用于发送和接收数据的 。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回一个可用于执行相同操作的 。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序只需要同步 i/o，请使用 。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use . 若要获得更详细的行为控制，请使用 。For more detailed behavioral control, use . 这两种方法都将一直阻塞，直到队列中有一个连接请求可用。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用 方法关闭 并停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责单独关闭已接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来侦听传入的客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

exception.span: 使用 属性获取指定的错误代码。

span.span: Use the property to obtain the specific error code.

exception.span: 获取此代码后，可以参考 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 错误代码文档，获取有关错误的详细说明。

span.span: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation for a detailed description of the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start(int32 backlog) cil managed

param.name: backlog
param.span: 挂起连接队列的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of the pending connections queue.

summary.span: 启动对具有最大挂起连接数的传入连接请求的侦听。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests with a maximum number of pending connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础 ，将其绑定到本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求， 会将请求排队，并继续侦听其他请求，直到调用 方法。If a connection request is received, will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果 在已对连接的最大数量进行排队后收到连接请求，则会在客户端上引发 。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入连接队列中删除连接，请使用 方法或 方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列中删除连接，并返回可用于发送和接收数据的 。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回一个可用于执行相同操作的 。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序只需要同步 i/o，请使用 。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use the . 若要获得更详细的行为控制，请使用 方法。For more detailed behavioral control, use method. 这两种方法都将一直阻塞，直到队列中有一个连接请求可用。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用 方法关闭 并停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责单独关闭已接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 请使用 属性获取特定的错误代码，并参考 [ Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)文档，以获取有关此错误的详细说明。Use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来侦听传入的客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

exception.span: 访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while accessing the socket.

exception.span: 参数小于零或超出允许的最大连接数。

span.span: The parameter is less than zero or exceeds the maximum number of permitted connections.

exception.span: 基础 为空。

span.span: The underlying is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭侦听器。

span.span: Closes the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭侦听器。 closes the listener. 队列中任何未接受的连接请求都将丢失。Any unaccepted connection requests in the queue will be lost. 等待连接被接受的远程主机将引发 。Remote hosts waiting for a connection to be accepted will throw a . 你负责单独关闭已接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法关闭基础 。The following code example demonstrates using the method to close the underlying . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)]

para.span: 方法还会关闭基础 ，并为 创建新的 。

span.span: The method also closes the underlying , and creates a new for the .

para.span: 如果在调用 方法之前设置基础 上的任何属性，这些属性将不会转移到新的 。

span.span: If you set any properties on the underlying prior to calling the method, those properties will not carry over to the new .
